body:
Most notable changes are:
- Fixes an exeception if you have a `src` toplevel directory: https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/issues/579
- Introduce `argsForDownstreamModules` to fine-tune downstream modules of changed modules (e.g. to run a smaller test set): https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/issues/562
- Fix some documentation issues
- Lower `Ignoring changed file outside build project: ...` and `Ignoring changed file in non-reactor module: ...` messages from WARN to DEBUG: https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/issues/567
  ℹ️ Use `-X` to see those messages (together with many more messages by Maven itself).
  ℹ️ If you want a config toggle to control the level, please leave a comment in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/issues/589.
- Update JGit from 6.2.0 to 6.3.0: https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/571

## What's Changed
* Bump version.jetty from 10.0.9 to 10.0.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/545
* Bump maven-resources-plugin from 3.2.0 to 3.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/555
* Bump maven-install-plugin from 3.0.0-M1 to 3.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/554
* Bump maven-jar-plugin from 3.2.2 to 3.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/569
* CI: JDK 18 -> 19, 19-ea -> 20-ea by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/570
* Bump version.jgit from 6.2.0.202206071550-r to 6.3.0.202209071007-r by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/571
* Bump maven-javadoc-plugin from 3.4.0 to 3.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/560
* Bump versions-maven-plugin from 2.11.0 to 2.12.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/568
* Bump junit-jupiter from 5.8.2 to 5.9.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/565
* Bump version.jetty from 10.0.11 to 10.0.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/573
* Bump maven-help-plugin from 3.2.0 to 3.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/577
* Fix IAE if 'src' exists in root and make sure to check for pom.xml by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/582
* Lower warnings in ChangedProjects to DEBUG by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/584
* Avoid JavaDoc 'warning: no comment' spam on Java 17 by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/585
* Bump archunit-junit5 from 0.23.1 to 1.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/575
* Bump versions-maven-plugin from 2.12.0 to 2.13.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/581
* Bump maven-site-plugin from 3.12.0 to 3.12.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/559
* Bump spotbugs-maven-plugin from 4.7.0.0 to 4.7.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/566
* Bump version.mockito from 4.6.1 to 4.8.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/580
* Bump maven-deploy-plugin from 3.0.0-M2 to 3.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/552
* Bump version.spotbugs from 4.7.0 to 4.7.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/572
* Bump version.bytebuddy from 1.12.10 to 1.12.18 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/576
* Fix examples in *Matches/Matching docs by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/586
* Fix or suppress deprecation warnings by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/588
* Introduce `argsForDownstreamModules` by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/587


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/compare/v4.1.1...v4.2.0

Most notable changes are:
- Classloading fix w.r.t `Xpp3Dom` when using GIB via `.mvn/extensions.xml`: #538
- Update JGit from 6.1.0 to 6.2.0: #537

## What's Changed
* Update to Maven 3.8.6 by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/535
* Bump maven-failsafe-plugin from 3.0.0-M6 to 3.0.0-M7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/532
* Bump maven-surefire-plugin from 3.0.0-M6 to 3.0.0-M7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/533
* Bump version.jgit from 6.1.0.202203080745-r to 6.2.0.202206071550-r by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/537
* Fix Xpp3Dom casting when using GIB as core extension by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/539
* Bump maven-release-plugin from 3.0.0-M5 to 3.0.0-M6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/534
* Bump maven-enforcer-plugin from 3.0.0 to 3.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/536
* CI: Add Java 19 EA, switch 18 EA to 18 by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/540
* Bump version.mockito from 4.6.0 to 4.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/531


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/compare/v4.1.0...v4.1.1

name: 4.1.0 :: test scope-aware downstream handling
body:
Most notable change is the "test scope-aware" downstream handling, resulting in fewer transitive modules to be built if test-only changes are involved: #488

## What's Changed
* Bump archunit-junit5 from 0.23.0 to 0.23.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/500
* Bump version.jgit from 6.0.0.202111291000-r to 6.1.0.202203080745-r by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/504
* Bump maven-failsafe-plugin from 3.0.0-M5 to 3.0.0-M6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/509
* Bump maven-surefire-plugin from 3.0.0-M5 to 3.0.0-M6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/510
* Bump versions-maven-plugin from 2.9.0 to 2.10.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/506
* Fix IT errors by adding plexus-utils explicitly by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/516
* Bump logback-classic from 1.2.10 to 1.2.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/501
* Bump maven-compiler-plugin from 3.10.0 to 3.10.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/505
* Bump version.jetty from 10.0.8 to 10.0.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/511
* Bump jacoco-maven-plugin from 0.8.7 to 0.8.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/514
* Bump nexus-staging-maven-plugin from 1.6.8 to 1.6.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/515
* Bump maven-site-plugin from 3.11.0 to 3.12.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/519
* Bump maven-javadoc-plugin from 3.3.2 to 3.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/518

* Qualify transitive downstream dependencies w.r.t. the scope of changes by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/529

* Bump versions-maven-plugin from 2.10.0 to 2.11.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/525
* Bump spotbugs-maven-plugin from 4.5.3.0 to 4.7.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/524
* Bump version.mockito from 4.3.1 to 4.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/526

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/compare/v4.0.0...v4.1.0

name: 4.0.0 :: groupId changed & Java 11+ and Maven 3.6.3+ required!
body:
:warning: This release contains **breaking changes**:
- **`groupId`** has changed from `com.vackosar.gitflowincrementalbuilder` to `io.github.gitflow-incremental-builder`
- **Java 11+** and **Maven 3.6.3+** are the minimum requirements now (raised from Java 8 and Maven 3.5)
- **`useJschAgentProxy`** property was removed because JGit 6 now handles SSH authentication out of the box

The internal package structure was overhauled but this shouldn't have any effect on using GIB.

## What's Changed
* Raise Java requirement from 8 to 11, drop support for Maven 3.6.2 and before, update jetty for tests to 10.0.7 by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/460
* Bump version.jgit from 5.13.0.202109080827-r to 6.0.0.202111291000-r by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/442
* Change groupdId to io.github.gitflow-incremental-builder and version to 4.0.0-SNAPSHOT by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/466
* Leverage SSH agent support of JGit 6, removing `useJschAgentProxy` property and `jcraft` dependencies by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/482
* `com.vackosar.gitflowincrementalbuild` -> `io.github.gitflowincrementalbuilder` by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/491
* Extensive package restructurings with some visibility adjustments by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/492
* Bump version.jetty from 10.0.7 to 10.0.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/496
* ... and more

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/compare/version/3.15.0...v4.0.0

Most notable change is the support for fetching tags: #433

### 3.15 is the last 3.x before [GIB 4.0](https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/13) will be released (with breaking changes)!

## What's Changed
* Bump logback-classic to 1.2.9 (only used in tests!) by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/455
* CI: Always use temurin dist for 18-ea job by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/461
* Bump plexus-component-metadata from 2.1.0 to 2.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/458
* Bump maven-site-plugin from 3.9.1 to 3.10.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/459
* Bump maven-deploy-plugin from 3.0.0-M1 to 3.0.0-M2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/465
* Bump maven-release-plugin from 3.0.0-M4 to 3.0.0-M5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/469
* Bump maven-jar-plugin from 3.2.0 to 3.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/472
* Bump maven-compiler-plugin from 3.8.1 to 3.9.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/473
* Bump version.maven-plugin from 3.6.2 to 3.6.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/475
* Bump versions-maven-plugin from 2.8.1 to 2.9.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/476
* Support fetching tags by @famod in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/479
* Bump logback-classic from 1.2.9 to 1.2.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/457
* Bump assertj-core from 3.21.0 to 3.22.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/467
* Bump version.spotbugs from 4.5.2 to 4.5.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/468
* Bump version.bytebuddy from 1.12.5 to 1.12.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/474
* Bump spotbugs-maven-plugin from 4.5.0.0 to 4.5.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/470
* Bump version.mockito from 4.2.0 to 4.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/pull/478


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/compare/version/3.14.5...version/3.15.0

See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/29?closed=1).

Most notable change is that previously, GIB failed to detect any changes if your project is located under a path that contains `src`: #446

After a longer break, finally a new GIB patch release!

See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/28?closed=1).

Most notable changes are:
- [`forceBuildModules`](https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder#gibforcebuildmodules) can now be defined in a conditional way: #421
  (e.g. forcibly build unchanged module A _only_ if B was changed, not in general)
-  GIB now tries to be more user friendly by providing more diagnostic output and hints in case a branch is not found: #392
- JGit was updated to 5.13: #406
- GIB is now tested on the latest Java 17 JDK (Adoptium Temurin, as well as 8 and 11) and also on 18 EA (early access)

See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/26?closed=1).

Most notable changes are:
- A fix to how GIB handles embedded Maven projects in `src` (e.g. `src/test/resources/testproject`): #377
- GIB now "tolerates" multiple modules in the same directory: #376
- JGit updated to 5.12.0: #364

See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/25?closed=1).

Most notable changes are:
- All entries in a `logImpactedTo` file are now _relative_ instead of absolute paths: #353
- New property [`disableIfReferenceBranchMatches`](https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder#gibdisableifreferencebranchmatches): #356
- All `*Matches/Matching` properties (e.g. `disableIfBranchMatches`) don't match substrings anymore, only full strings (`Matcher.matches()` instead of `Matcher.find()`): #359 

As you can see, you should check your usage of some properties (and possibly adjust to the changed/fixed behavior of GIB).
This is a tiny release just fixing an unjustified log warning when running on Maven 3.8.1: #336

See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/23?closed=1).

Most notable changes are:
- Don't build downstream modules if just "src/test" contains changes: #331
- Maven 3.8.1 is now the preferred/primary version for GIB: #335
- Bump JGit from 5.10 to 5.11: #329

See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/22?closed=1).

Most notable changes are:
- Fix handling of `-pl` in conjunction with BOMs: #320
- A warning is logged when running on Maven 3.3.1-3.3.9 with respect to [MNG-6173](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MNG-6173): #325
- `*Regex` properties were renamed for consistency: #309

See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/gitflow-incremental-builder/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/20?closed=1).

Most notable changes are:
- Introduction of `skipIfPathMatches`: #310
- GIB has moved to its own GitHub organization and switched from Travis CI to GitHub Actions

See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/19?closed=1).

Most notable changes are:
- Various adjustments for "selected projects" (`-pl ...`) in context of #269 (see also #287)
- Fix unwanted project re-ordering via #288 which has mostly "cosmetic" effects but also fixes a potential problem with `-rf`: #247
- Update to JGit 5.10.0: #286

See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/17?closed=1).

Most notable changes are:
- Workaround for `currentProject` calculation for setups where some modules do not have the root module as parent: #239 & #242
- Basic support for BOMs (bill of material, `import` scoped `dependencyManagement` entries of type `pom`): #241
- Ability to switch off the special ["Explicitly selected projects"](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder#explicitly-selected-projects) handling: #252

Special thanks to @gastaldi and @mickroll for contributing fixes and reviewing changes.

See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/18?closed=1).

Most notable changes are:
- More Maven standard behavior in terms of plugin property handling: #213
- More user friendly behavior when GIB is added early to a new Git repo: #212
- Property `uncommited` was renamed to `uncommitted` (typo): #234

Special thanks to @mickroll and @tkalmar for contributing fixes and reporting issues.

See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/16?closed=1).

Most notable changes are:
- NPE fix for IntelliJ IDE and in certain other scenarios: #204
- Deprecation of `enabled` property and introduction of new `disable` property: #209
[See closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/15?closed=1).

See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/14?closed=1).

This release comes with "proper" **plugin configuration support**. This means that GIB can now be configured as a plugin.
See [`README`](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder#usage-as-a-maven-plugin) for more details.
In context of this change, _short_ aliases of the regular long names (e.g. `gib.dbc` instead of `gib.disableBranchComparison`) were _banned_ from `pom.xml.` This means that these short aliases can only be used as system properties (`-D...`).

Special thanks to @maxxedev for contributing the new [`disableIfBranchRegex`](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder#gibdisableifbranchregex) property!

See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/12?closed=1).

Except for minor change #172, this release contains only internal (test) changes.
See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder/issues?q=is%3Aclosed+milestone%3Arelease-3.10.1).

See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/10?closed=1).

The most notable change is the introduction of a proper (but maybe slightly opinionated) support for ["explicitly selected projects"](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder#explicitly-selected-projects) (`mvn -pl` and partially also `mvn -f`).

Two rather severe bugs were also fixed and two old, long deprecated property names were dropped.

See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder/issues?q=is%3Aclosed+milestone%3Arelease-3.9.2).

Thanks to a JGit upgrade, the delay caused by GIB should now be _much_ shorter.
See [closed issues and PRs](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/8?closed=1).
See [closed issues](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder/issues?q=is%3Aclosed+milestone%3Arelease-3.9.0).
See [closed issues](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/5?closed=1).
See [closed issues](https://github.com/vackosar/gitflow-incremental-builder/milestone/4?closed=1).
